Review: The coffee maker looks stylish but doesn’t work well.
The cheap plastic build makes me sad.
The coffee tastes burnt every time.
I admire the sleek design of this coffee maker.
It makes me angry that it doesn’t work properly.
I’m grateful for the programmable timer feature.
I regret buying this coffee maker.
I am surprised that the coffee tastes decent.
The brewing function is completely broken.
The machine broke down after one week.
The water dripping everywhere is disgusting.
It made a mess on the counter during brewing.
The coffee smells great but tastes awful.
The machine feels unsafe when it gets too hot.
The instruction manual is very confusing.
It’s disappointing to start my day with weak coffee.
The brewing process is embarrassingly noisy.
It takes forever to brew a single cup.
I approve of the reusable filter feature.
The water reservoir leaks every time.
I realized this coffee maker was a bad choice.
I wish it had a stronger coffee option.
The effort to clean this machine is frustrating.
